snippet: The United States Embassy in Athens on Friday warned of the risk of violent attacks against visitors “perceived to be foreign migrants” after a rise in racially motivated assaults in Greece.
abstract: United States Embassy in Athens issues travel warning noting risks of violent attacks against visitors 'perceived to be foreign migrants' after a rise in racially motivated assaults in Greece, where far-right sentiment is on the rise.
lead_paragraph: The United States Embassy in Athens on Friday warned of the risk of violent attacks against visitors “perceived to be foreign migrants” after a rise in racially motivated assaults in Greece.

headline.seo: U.S Issues Travel Warning for Greece
